Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: I don't know how to test this, but I can already tell the tray is a lot more stable. The tray client for Spotify (qt4) would never survive a bar reload before, but now I can hold down the reload button and it is fine.

Author: anonymous
Comment:
It looks like there are a couple of fixes in this patch. Please split them up into smaller commits that are more easily understandable and re-submit.

I.e., submit one patch for the “XEMBED_EMBEDDED_NOTIFY gets sent at the wrong time” problem, one for the different handling of UnmapNotify events, etc. Ideally each of these patches should not break the tray, but I value clarity over breakage in this case.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: That was actually my comment, sorry for posting anonymously.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Also I don’t like this. What’s up with that code? If it’s not necessary anymore, then delete it.
